description.en:
Buypay (WBPC) is used to drive a variety of integrated payment platforms, including in-platform billing, events, and product purchases, such as the actual operating Global B2B Mall. Buypay aims to directly connect ordinary users/business users to franchises, and utilize Blockchain Smart Contract and token economy to provide an easier and faster payment platform.

Buypay is issued by ‘G-Com' under G-Com Co., Ltd., a company registered in Korea
